messages.content: Flux-Prompt-Generator is a ComfyUI node designed to provide a flexible and customizable prompt generator for detailed and creative image generation prompts.

The generator allows users to select specific terms from various JSON data files containing descriptive terms or choose 'random' to pick terms at random. These terms are combined to create detailed prompts for image generation.
What are the available categories of descriptive terms in Flux-Prompt-Generator?

The categories include artform, photo type, body types, default tags, roles, hairstyles, additional details, photography styles, device, photographer, artist, digital art form, place, lighting, clothing, composition, pose, background, face features, eye colors, facial hair, skin tone, age group, ethnicity, accessories, expression, tattoos & scars, makeup styles, hair color, body markings, and more.
How can users integrate Flux-Prompt-Generator into a ComfyUI workflow?

Users need to add the Flux-Prompt-Generator node to their ComfyUI workflow, configure the desired parameters such as seed, custom text, subject, artform, and other options specific to the generation requirements, and then connect the output of the node to a text-to-image model like Flux or Stable Diffusion.
What is the purpose of the 'Seed' parameter in Flux-Prompt-Generator?
The 'Seed' parameter controls the randomness of the generated prompts. Different seeds will produce different variations in the generated images.
Can users manually input custom terms into the Flux-Prompt-Generator?
Yes, users can manually input custom terms through the 'Custom' parameter to customize the prompt according to their needs.
What are the benefits of using Flux-Prompt-Generator?

Flux-Prompt-Generator offers a wide range of descriptive terms and parameters to create highly specific and detailed prompts for generating images. This versatility allows users to generate a vast array of imaginative and creative images tailored to their preferences.
